data.message: R.I.P Eminem ...1972-2009 !!! Dont know who this new re-formed shady is but stick to what made you famous and stop rapping so fast! You sound stupid!! From a true fan for real

replies.message: Nothing wrong with it... he kills it every time
New eminem sounds like a clone, shit sucks
Eminem sounds shit rapping fast!!!  He kills nothing!!! Unless its a good beat then yeh lol he kills it EVERY.FUCKIN. TIME!!! LOL

After he stopped drugs he become the band faggot he used to diss, he's doing songs with pink n bruno mars for fuck sake lol!!! Eminem your a Hypocrite, and your old self would kick you in the ass lol!!!
Come on dude, his 42 now! His music needs to grow too!

Umm....pretty sure he's rapping about more or less the same shit lol so he ain't "growing" , he's just getting old!!! And STILL doesn't explain why he switched from a perfectly good flow to this shit I here today, like rap god lol!!! Wtf was that all about ?? And F.Y.I Tech N9ne is the REAL RAP GOD !!!
